key_changes.replaced_manual_auth: All handlers now use products_aws_auth_middleware() instead of manual IAMProvider.get() calls
key_changes.replaced_manual_logging: All handlers now use aws_lambda_logging_middleware() instead of manual logger.debug() calls
key_changes.replaced_manual_error_handling: All handlers now use aws_lambda_exception_handler_middleware() instead of @lambda_exception_handler decorator
key_changes.unified_timeout_handling: All handlers now have configurable timeout=30.0 seconds
key_changes.cors_handling: CORS headers handled automatically by middleware system
key_changes.code_reduction: Significant reduction in boilerplate code per handler

migration_approach.error_handling: Let middleware catch and format all exceptions automatically
migration_approach.logging_strategy: Middleware handles all request/response logging automatically
migration_approach.business_logic_focus: Handlers now focus purely on business logic

cross_phase_impact.phase_3_4_ready: recipes_catalog context can follow same migration pattern
cross_phase_impact.phase_3_5_ready: Integration testing can proceed with products_catalog handlers
